exam.question: These teachers try to be objective when they ______ the integrated ability of their students.

answer.explain: 句意： 这些老师在评价学生综合能力的时候力求客观。justify： 证明…是正当的； indicate： 显示； reckon： 计算。

sentences.sContent: You should be able to evaluate your own work.
sentences.sCn: 你应该能够评估自己的工作。

sentences.sContent: We need to evaluate the success of the campaign.
sentences.sCn: 我们要评估一下这次运动是否成功。

sentences.sContent: It can be difficult to evaluate the effectiveness of different treatments.
sentences.sCn: 要对各种治疗方法的效果作出评估会很难。

sentences.sContent: ...Dutt says they were not able to evaluate the actual scientific qualifications of the applicants using the data in the files...

remMethod.val: e(出) ＋ valu(看作value， 价值) ＋ ate(做) → 评定出价值 → 评价； 估…的价

words.tran: 评价；[审计] 评估；估价；求值

trans.tranOther: to judge how good, useful, or successful something is
